descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart won't be denied as he muscles through his defender for the and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Stewart somehow gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/02/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Stewart muscles through his defender for a Pistons and-1

videos.description: Reggie Bullock hauls in the dime from Jalen Brunson and drains the 3-pointer to give the Mavericks the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jalen Brunson makes beautiful dish for a basket) 2022/02/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jalen Brunson dimes Reggie Bullock for the deep 3

videos.description: Dwight Powell gathers the rock and knocks down the and-1 to pull the Mavericks within one.
videos.headline: Jalen Brunson sets up Dwight Powell with an absolute dime

videos.description: Dwight Powell throws down the dish from Dorian Finney-Smith to extend the Mavericks' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dorian Finney-Smith makes beautiful dime for a basket) 2022/02/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dorian Finney-Smith with the beautiful dish to Dwight Powell for the flush

videos.description: Despite being hit in the face, Dorian Finney-Smith still finds a way to knock down the and-1 basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dorian Finney-Smith gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/02/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dorian Finney-Smith somehow drains the and-1

videos.description: Dorian Finney-Smith hauls in the laser from Jalen Brunson and drills the 3-pointer for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jalen Brunson shows off his vision with nice pass vs. Detroit Pistons) 2022/02/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jalen Brunson dimes Dorian Finney-Smith for the deep 3

videos.description: It's showtime in Dallas as Dorian Finney-Smith soars the paint to throw down the lob from Luka Doncic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Doncic makes beautiful dish for a basket) 2022/02/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka lobs a beauty to Finney-Smith for a slam
